com.itworks.snamp.adapters

Interface Adapter

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Aggregator, java.lang.AutoCloseable, PlatformPlugin, PlatformService, net.xeoh.plugins.base.Plugin
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractAdapter, EmbeddedAdapter, SnmpAdapterBase

    public interface Adapter
extends java.lang.AutoCloseable, PlatformPlugin
    Represents hosting adapter, that exposes management information to the outside world.

    The implementer should have parameterless constructor and annotated with PluginImplementation.

    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Roman Sakno

    • Method Detail

      • start

        boolean start(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> parameters)
              throws java.io.IOException
        Exposes the connector to the world.
        Parameters:
        parameters - The adapter startup parameters.
        Returns:
        true, if adapter is started successfully; otherwise, false.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • stop

        boolean stop(boolean saveAttributes)
        Stops the connector hosting.
        Parameters:
        saveAttributes - true to save previously exposed attributes for reuse; otherwise, clear internal list of exposed attributes.
        Returns:
        true, if adapter is previously started; otherwise, false.

      • exposeAttributes

        void exposeAttributes(ManagementConnector connector,
                    java.lang.String namespace,
                    java.util.Map<java.lang.String,AgentConfiguration.ManagementTargetConfiguration.AttributeConfiguration> attributes)
        Exposes management attributes.
        Parameters:
        connector - The management connector that provides access to the specified attributes.
        namespace - The attributes namespace.
        attributes - The dictionary of attributes.

      • exposeEvents

        void exposeEvents(ManagementConnector connector,
                java.lang.String namespace,
                java.util.Map<java.lang.String,AgentConfiguration.ManagementTargetConfiguration.EventConfiguration> events)
        Exposes monitoring events.
        Parameters:
        connector - The management connector that provides notification listening and subscribing.
        namespace - The events namespace.
        events - The collection of configured notifications.
